nodes.bodyText: Wrong import? We shouldn't be using this class.
No need to use String.format. Also, the message is better as "Compute profile creation is not allowed".
We usually put defaults in cdap-defaults.xml, after which the default value here doesn't need to be given.

also, this method handles both creates and updates. If we only want to block creation it needs to be handled differently. If we want to block creation and updates, then we should change the configuration property name and the error message.
I would think that we want to block updates as well, otherwise users can just change the existing profile.
this is kind of an awkward name, let's just name it profile.updates.allowed.
